abstractText: This modern multi-text manuscript of a few folios contains two short texts, the Tathāgatavyāptaśata and the Pañcaviṃśatikāprajñāpāramitāhṛdayadhāraṇī. The former consists of 23 verses and includes stotra and tantra elements with a possible protective function as a 'shield' (kavaca). The latter incorporates the longer version of the Heart Sūtra and it was used by E. Conze in his edition published in 1948.
abstractShort: This modern multi-text manuscript of a few folios contains two short texts, the Tathāgatavyāptaśata and the Pañcaviṃśatikāprajñāpāramitāhṛdayadhāraṇī.
title: Tathāgatavyāptaśata, Pañcaviṃśatikāprajñāpāramitāhṛdayadhāraṇī
